Master Jeweler Dyne ：
Interested in Fallen Angel accessories? The Fallen Angel is a creature born of the Chaos God Gran Cain. Unfortunately, I don’t know anything more about him.
But recently, Fallen Angel's accessories were found It is still not completely clear how the accessories could be nourished by the power of this creature, but the magicians examined them and created the Scroll of the Fallen Angel Accessories Modification This item can enhance the accessories of the Fallen Angel.
Using the scroll is simple, but you won’t reach the top of the modification with it. If you want, you can bring me the Ring of the Fallen Angel of modification +9 and above and I will seal it.
